pr_title: Add array type descriptor support to new parser

timeline.message: Array type descriptor support to new parser
Recovery logic and test cases for array type descriptor
Added metadata block to json files
Reformat json files to four space indent
Infinite dimension support for the array type descriptor.

timeline.bodyText:
I think the structure of the resulting tree is a bit different to the spec.
e.g. for something like int[][][], this model group the tree nodes as (int) ([][][]).
But in the spec, it is: (((int)[])[])[].
I feel recursion would solve this.

timeline.message:
Extend the array type descriptor support with optional type.

Changed the structure of the array type descriptor. ie. changed (int) ([][][]) to (((int)[])[])[]. Extend the support with optional type desc eg. int?[]?, int[]?[] are now supported.

timeline.bodyText:
STATEMENT_START_IDENTIFIER should be replaced with VARIABLE_REF.
Both indeed refers to identifiers, but the contexts are different..

timeline.message:
Flattened array dimension into the array type descriptor node.

Removed ArrayDimension.java and added open bracket, array length, close bracket subtrees into ArrayTypeDescriptorNode. Changed the test JSON files to match with the new node structure.
